BraveLittleSapling_Description: An animated family comedy about a little sprout on a magical adventure to become a tree!
BraveLittleSapling_Scene2: The brave little sapling is leaving his home. He hesitates for a moment and turns around, knowing he won't be back for a long time...
BraveLittleSapling_Scene3: The other saplings of his grove are gathered at the edge of town, excitedly waving their twigs goodbye...!
BraveLittleSapling_Scene4: Oh no! Out of nowhere, it starts raining...! The little sapling goes into a sprint as thunderclouds loom overhead...
BraveLittleSapling_Scene5: Fearing for his life, and demoralized by the relentless downpour, the brave little sapling begins to lose hope...
BraveLittleSapling_Scene6: ...But what's this...? The sapling feels a tingling on the top of his head...
BraveLittleSapling_Scene7: Perhaps a little rain was what it needed to begin its journey into becoming a tree!
Mysterium_Description: Peer behind the midnight veil... You must experience to believe!
Mysterium_Scene2: A faint silhouette in the dark...
Mysterium_Scene5: The desolate, unknown void of space... where untold horrors await.
Mysterium_Scene8: A variety of disjointed, other-worldly scenes play out...
Mysterium_Scene10: 'You MUST tell your friends to see MYSTERIUM tonight...'
Mysterium_Scene11: '...Or I will visit you in your sleep!'
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Title: Journey Of The Prairie King: The Motion Picture
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Description: The beloved video game comes to the silver screen!
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene1: 'Journey Of The Prairie King: The Motion Picture'
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene2: On the dusty old trail once again, we find Prairie King watching over a wagon train full of valuable treasure.
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene3: But, unbeknownst to our hero, the evil outlaw is watching from a nearby cliff...
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene4: 'At last, I'll do away with that self-righteous sheriff and make off with the treasure... I deserve it!'
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene5: 'Whoops! Looks like this avalanche is headed straight for the wagon train.'
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene6: The Prairie King hears a faint rumbling in the distance... Look!
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene7: Thinking quickly, he fires a shot.
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene8: But what's this? Water's flying everywhere!
JourneyOfThePrairieKing_Scene9: He's done it again! The thick mud stops the avalanche in its tracks.
Wumbus_Description: An absurd sci-fi comedy centered around the life and times of a lumpy guy from another star.
Wumbus_Scene2: Wumbus, always at ease, stretches out and enjoys the warmth of his planet's sun.
Wumbus_Scene3: His faithful servant, FoodBot, provides a steady stream of fried gluten pucks and 'red sauce'.
Wumbus_Scene4: Wumbus tries to get his nephew, Rossel, interested in star-system culture and affairs, but Rossel is unimpressed.
Wumbus_Scene6: The movie is a humorous slice-of-life into Wumbus' strange world, a world where technology and society have 'advanced' to an extreme degree.
Wumbus_Scene7: Many scenes attempt to find humor in the absurdity of the modern lifestyle.
Wumbus_Scene8: But, despite having near-infinite entertainment options, Wumbus and his group of friends still enjoy gathering for a delicious meal of 'pizza' (formed from 100% gluten materials).
ZuzuCityExpress_Description: A beloved movie classic, carefully restored for modern theaters.
ZuzuCityExpress_Scene2: The Zuzu City Express makes one final trip south, from the icy coast... It's a three day journey!
ZuzuCityExpress_Scene3: A young lady peers wistfully out the window.
ZuzuCityExpress_Scene6: The movie explores a timeless theme... the conflict between reason and emotion.
ZuzuCityExpress_Scene7: Will she follow the directions of her rational mind, or the longings of her heart?
ZuzuCityExpress_Scene8: The movie ends before we ever find out...
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Description: Against all odds, a family keeps the spirit of the Winter Star alive...
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene2: It's the eve of The Winter Star, and it's been snowing for 3 weeks straight.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene3: The Coldstar family is stranded... getting to town is impossible. Fortunately, the cows have enough hay to get by.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene5: ...But the family has run out of food.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene7: Still, Papa Coldstar braves the treacherous conditions to cut down the winter star tree...
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene9: In spite of their hunger, the family decorates the tree, keeping the promise of the Winter Star alive.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene12: The next day, Mama Coldstar is astonished to find the tree adorned with cosmic fruit.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene12_2: 'We believed in the Winter Star, and so we were remembered!'
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene13: They all shared the Stardrop fruit. Despite its small size, it was the most filling and delicious meal they'd ever had.
MiracleAtColdstarRanch_Scene14: The family is saved, and the spirit of hope is alive and well. The promise of the Winter Star is kept once again...
NaturalWonders_Title: Natural Wonders: Exploring Our Vibrant World
NaturalWonders_Description: Take a tour through the lands of the Ferngill Republic... from The Fern Islands to Zuzu City, this world is full of life!
NaturalWonders_Scene2: The Fern Islands, a tropical paradise 80 miles off the southern coast. The islands formed due to volcanic activity in the region, and are still growing...
NaturalWonders_Scene3: The warm climate of the southern ocean allows for extreme biodiversity... in short, the island is teeming with life!
NaturalWonders_Scene4: Now we move north to the bustle of Zuzu City. It's a world of concrete and steel, illuminated by the glow of city light.
NaturalWonders_Scene5: The conditions may be harsh, but still, we find abundant life...
NaturalWonders_Scene6: Far to the west, alone in the vast Gem Sea, lies Prairie Island. In spite of its name, this land is home to a diverse array of natural biomes.
NaturalWonders_Scene7: The island is known for its abundant population of raccoons!
NaturalWonders_Scene8: Finally, we return to the mainland, to visit one of the most pleasant areas of the continent... Stardew Valley.
NaturalWonders_Scene9: The temperate climate of the valley is the perfect home for a variety of woodland creatures and insects. What a beautiful place!
ItHowlsInTheRain_Description: A group of youngsters set out to discover the source of a mysterious sound. (Parental Supervision Required)
ItHowlsInTheRain_Scene2: 'The following footage was salvaged from an abandoned camcorder 30 miles south of Grampleton'
ItHowlsInTheRain_Scene3: 'Did you hear that? I think it came from those woods... Let's go...'
ItHowlsInTheRain_Scene5: (The camera lurches forward into the forest)
ItHowlsInTheRain_Scene6: 'Oh, it's just you, Gary... *pant* *pant*... Stop grabbing my arm!'
ItHowlsInTheRain_Scene9: (Muffled cries and a strange shuffling sound can be heard)
